scripts.init: npm i -g pnpm@8.1.1 && npm i -g cross-env && cross-env-shell PLAYWRIGHT_SKIP_BROWSER_DOWNLOAD=true pnpm i
scripts.sudo-init: sudo npm i -g pnpm@8.1.1 && PLAYWRIGHT_SKIP_BROWSER_DOWNLOAD=true pnpm i
scripts.codegen: node iridium_patchfix.js && pnpm prisma:generate && pnpm rspc-bindings:generate
scripts.build:linux-x64: cargo build -p core_module --profile=production --features iridium_lib --target x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu && pnpm prepare-release:linux-x64 && turbo run build -- --x64 --linux -- --production
scripts.build:win-x64: cargo build -p core_module --profile=production --features iridium_lib --target x86_64-pc-windows-msvc && turbo run build -- --x64 --win -- --production
scripts.build:mac-x64: cargo build -p core_module --profile=production --features iridium_lib --target x86_64-apple-darwin && pnpm prepare-release:mac-x64-prod && turbo run build -- --x64 --mac -- --production
scripts.build:mac-arm64: cargo build -p core_module --profile=production --features iridium_lib --target aarch64-apple-darwin && pnpm prepare-release:mac-arm64-prod && turbo run build -- --arm64 --mac -- --production
scripts.build:linux-x64-prod: cargo build -p core_module --profile=production --features iridium_lib --target x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu && pnpm prepare-release:linux-x64-prod && turbo run build -- --x64 -- --linux --production
scripts.build:win-x64-prod: cargo build -p core_module --profile=production --features iridium_lib --target x86_64-pc-windows-msvc && turbo run build -- --x64 --win -- --production
scripts.build:mac-x64-prod: cargo build -p core_module --profile=production --features iridium_lib --target x86_64-apple-darwin && pnpm prepare-release:mac-x64-prod && turbo run build -- --x64 --mac -- --production
scripts.build:mac-arm64-prod: cargo build -p core_module --profile=production --features iridium_lib --target aarch64-apple-darwin && pnpm prepare-release:mac-arm64-prod && turbo run build -- --arm64 --mac -- --production
